scripts.build: rm -rf docs .parcel-tmp && parcel build "src/**/*.html" --public-url ./ --dist-dir .parcel-tmp && rsync -a --exclude='*.js' .parcel-tmp/ docs/ && find .parcel-tmp -type f -name '*.js' -print | while read -r f; do out="docs/${f#.parcel-tmp/}"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$out")"; javascript-obfuscator "$f" --output "$out"; done && rm -rf .parcel-tmp
